mapper.select: select BM01 BM01, WLDW01 WLDW01, WLDCI01 DCJE, RYXX01 YWY_RYXX01, (SELECT BM02 FROM BM WHERE BM01 = A.BM01) BMMC, (SELECT WLDW02 FROM WLDW WHERE WLDW01 = A.WLDW01) WLDWMC, (SELECT RYXX02 FROM RYXX WHERE RYXX01 = A.RYXX01) YWY_RYXXMC, A.WLDCI02 LX, A.FLDM01 FL, A.KHYHD01 KHYHD01, A.GCDJH GCDLD01, A.WLDCI06 KZXS from WLDCDITEM A,WLDCD B where 1 = 1 AND A.WLDC01 = B.WLDC01 AND A.GSXX01 = B.GSXX01

SELECT distinct A.SKFS01 key, A.SKFS02 value FROM SKFS A WHERE 1=1
AND A.SKFS06 in (${SKFS06})
JL{CZY|A.SKFS01|SKFS_CZ|LIKE%}JL
